name: GitHub (Remote)
description: Interact with GitHub repositories, issues, pull requests, actions, and code security through GitHub's hosted remote MCP server. No local installation required. Authenticates with a Personal Access Token (PAT) via Bearer header.

inputs.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
inputs.description: Personal Access Token for GitHub. Create a fine-grained PAT with the scopes needed for the tools you want to use.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to github.com/settings/tokens
2. Click 'Generate new token' > 'Fine-grained token'
3. Set expiration, select repositories, and choose permissions
4. Click 'Generate token' and copy it

auth.instructions: Create a GitHub Personal Access Token (fine-grained) at https://github.com/settings/tokens with the scopes needed for the tools you want to use. The token is sent as a Bearer token in the Authorization header.
